text: Sredi lyudey yest' takiye, kotoryye priobshchayut k Allakhu ravnykh i lyubyat ikh tak zhe, kak lyubyat Allakha. No te, kotoryye uverovali, lyubyat Allakha sil'neye. Yesli by bezzakonniki, uzrev mucheniya, uvideli, chto mogushchestvo tselikom prinadlezhit Allakhu i chto Allakh prichinyayet tyazhkiye mucheniya
